channel.title: Build Easier, Ship Faster: Why We Launched Liteflow
channel.description:
Liteflow is a new open platform for application processing that helps developer-entrepreneurs launch projects easily and quickly.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/why-did-we-build-liteflow/
